name: Courageous Knight
description:
Sir Courageous Knight's valor and courage are only matched by his inability to navigate. But never fear! For with your help, this headstrong knight can dive deeper than anyone ever has into an endless, ever-changing dungeon.

Rearrange the dungeon walls to grab treasure in this atari-style puzzle game. With an endless number of levels that continuously adapt to your skill level, Courageous Knight is sure to fill that puzzle-shaped hole in your heart.

Game by Ryan G King

Music by Joseph Bowman
